summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2510 for the improvement of Alley in Block Nine (9), Terry's Fifty Addition to the City of Seattle, and Block Two Hundred Six (206), Seattle Tide Lands, these being the blocks between Dearborn Street and Charles Street, and Sixth Avenue and Maynard Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by bridging, under Ordinance No. 28669, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
